import React from 'react'; import { QRCodeSVG } from 'qrcode.react'; const CertificateTemplate = ({ certificateData = {} }) => { const { name = "Swathi", event = "Cloud Bootcamp", type = "Winner", organizer = "College", date = new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }), certificateId = `CERT-${Date.now()}-1001` } = certificateData; const verificationUrl = `${window.location.origin}/verify/${certificateId}`; const qrData = JSON.stringify({ id: certificateId, name: name, event: event, award: type, date: date, verifyUrl: verificationUrl }); return (
üèÜ

CERTIFICATE OF ACHIEVEMENT

Digitally Signed & Verifiable

CERTIFICATE

This certifies that

{name}

has achieved

{type.toUpperCase()}

in

"{event}"

organized by

{organizer}

Certificate ID: {certificateId}
Date: {date}
Organizer: {organizer}

Scan to Verify

‚úÖ Digitally Generated
üîí Secure
üì± QR Verifiable
); }; const styles = { container: { width: '800px', minHeight: '600px', backgroundColor: '#fffef0', border: '20px solid #f8f8f8', borderRadius: '15px', boxShadow: '0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)', position: 'relative', fontFamily: "'Georgia', serif", overflow: 'hidden', margin: '20px auto' }, border: { position: 'absolute', top: '10px', left: '10px', right: '10px', bottom: '10px', border: '2px solid #d4af37', borderRadius: '5px', pointerEvents: 'none' }, header: { background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, #1a2980, #26d0ce)', padding: '25px 30px', textAlign: 'center', position: 'relative', color: 'white' }, seal: { position: 'absolute', top: '15px', left: '20px', width: '70px', height: '70px', background: 'radial-gradient(circle, #ffd700, #daa520)', borderRadius: '50%', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', fontSize: '32px', border: '3px solid #b8860b', boxShadow: '0 0 20px rgba(218, 165, 32, 0.6)', zIndex: 1 }, title: { fontSize: '2.8em', margin: '0', letterSpacing: '3px', textShadow: '2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)', fontWeight: 'bold' }, subtitle: { fontSize: '1.2em', marginTop: '10px', opacity: '0.9', letterSpacing: '1px' }, body: { padding: '40px 50px', backgroundImage: 'url("https://www.transparenttextures.com/patterns/cream-paper.png")', minHeight: '500px', position: 'relative' }, watermark: { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(-45deg)', fontSize: '120px', color: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.03)', fontWeight: 'bold', zIndex: 0, pointerEvents: 'none', whiteSpace: 'nowrap' }, text: { textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '1.3em', color: '#555', margin: '15px 0', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, nameContainer: { margin: '25px 0', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, name: { textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '3.5em', color: '#1a2980', margin: '0', fontFamily: "'Brush Script MT', cursive", fontWeight: 'bold', textShadow: '2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)', background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, #1a2980, #26d0ce)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', backgroundClip: 'text' }, awardContainer: { margin: '20px 0', textAlign: 'center', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, award: { display: 'inline-block', padding: '12px 40px', backgroundColor: '#e74c3c', color: 'white', fontSize: '1.8em', fontWeight: 'bold', borderRadius: '50px', boxShadow: '0 5px 15px rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.4)', letterSpacing: '1px' }, eventContainer: { margin: '20px 0', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, event: { textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '2.2em', color: '#2c3e50', margin: '0', fontStyle: 'italic', fontWeight: 'bold', padding: '10px 20px', borderBottom: '3px double #3498db', display: 'inline-block' }, organizer: { textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '1.4em', color: '#3498db', fontWeight: 'bold', margin: '10px 0 30px', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, details: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)', border: '2px dashed #3498db', borderRadius: '10px', padding: '25px', margin: '40px 0', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, detailRow: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', padding: '10px 0', borderBottom: '1px solid #eee' }, detailLabel: { fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#2c3e50', fontSize: '1.1em' }, detailValue: { color: '#e74c3c', fontFamily: 'monospace', fontSize: '1.1em', fontWeight: 'bold' }, qrSection: { position: 'absolute', bottom: '30px', right: '30px', zIndex: 1 }, qrBox: { backgroundColor: 'white', padding: '15px', borderRadius: '10px', border: '2px solid #3498db', boxShadow: '0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)', textAlign: 'center' }, qrLabel: { marginTop: '10px', fontSize: '0.9em', color: '#666', fontWeight: 'bold' }, footer: { backgroundColor: '#2c3e50', color: 'white', padding: '20px', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-around', alignItems: 'center', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, footerItem: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '10px', fontSize: '1.1em' }, footerIcon: { fontSize: '1.3em' } }; export default CertificateTemplate;
